song.title: In Control
song.info:
Why is it that the sadness wouldn't leave, That there's always something cold in this warm world of mine? Every sun ray seems to hurt; flowers fade as I walk by. This small itch when I think everything's just fine.
So why don't I feel the contentment, the happiness I am supposed to feel? Why do I still dwell in compassion, denying to see that my dream's come real? I just want to finally realise I'm in control of what I'll become, Without need of asking the world while still here and not long gone.
Come on!
